alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 22 at 9:54AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH TONIGHT... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rainfall is possible WHERE...American Samoa WHEN...Through tonight IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause flooding on roadways and properties and overflowing of streams. Landslides are also possible with saturated soils. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A trough continues to linger over the islands, which will keep the potential for flash flooding for the territory through tonight. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 952 Taeao Aso Lua Fepuari 22 2022 ...UA IAI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE PO NANEI... MAFUAAGA...O Lologa ma Tafega e ono mafua mai i le tetele o timuga o lata mai i le atunu`u. NOFOAGA...motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le po nanei AAFIAGA...O le tetele o timuga e ono mafua ai lologa ma tafega i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga a`afia gofie, fa`apea auvai pa pa. E mafai fo`i ona tutupu mai sologa i mauga ona o le susu o le eleele ua iai nei. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O le a tumau uiga louloua o le tau i luga o le atunu`u e oo i le po nanei, ma o le a fa`atupula`ia ai tafega ma lologa. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.
